name: Together We Clear
description:
Together We Clear plays like a modified game of snake. You start out with control of one adventurer and must find allies in the dungeon. With the combined strength of many adventurers, you can take on the enemies you encounter.

Find and collect the relic and then find and exit through the door to clear the dungeon.

Plan your route carefully to avoid running into walls and traps!

Tools used: 

Unity, GIMP, and Chiptone

This game was made for Ludum Dare 43.

Rate it here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/together-we-clear
